  • Constructor Details

    • ArDoCo

      public ArDoCo(String projectName)
      Creates a new instance of ArDoCo. The provided name should be the project's name and will be used to identify spots within the text where the project is mentioned.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the project's name

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ArDoCo getInstance(String projectName)

    • getDataRepository

      public edu.kit.kastel.informalin.data.DataRepository getDataRepository()

    • run

      public static ArDoCoResult run(String name, File inputText, File inputArchitectureModel, ArchitectureModelType architectureModel, File additionalConfigs)
      Run the approach with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the run
      inputText - File of the input text.
      inputArchitectureModel - File of the input model (PCM or UML)
      architectureModel - the architecture model to use
      Returns:
      the ArDoCoResult that contains the blackboard with all results (of all steps)

    • runAndSave

      public ArDoCoResult runAndSave(String name, File inputText, File inputArchitectureModel, ArchitectureModelType architectureModelType, File inputCodeModel, File additionalConfigsFile, File outputDir)
      Run the approach with the given parameters and save the output to the file system.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the run
      inputText - File of the input text.
      inputArchitectureModel - File of the input model (PCM or UML)
      architectureModelType - the architecture model to use
      inputCodeModel - File of the input model (Java Code JSON)
      additionalConfigsFile - File with the additional or overwriting config parameters that should be used
      outputDir - File that represents the output directory where the results should be written to
      Returns:
      the ArDoCoResult that contains the blackboard with all results (of all steps)

      dataRepository - the data repository
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • getTextProvider

      public static TextProvider getTextProvider(File inputText, Map<String,String> additionalConfigs, edu.kit.kastel.informalin.data.DataRepository dataRepository) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates a CoreNLPProvider as TextProvider and reads the provided text.
      Parameters:
      inputText - the text that should be read
      additionalConfigs - the additional configuration that should be applied
      dataRepository - the data repository
      Returns:
      a CoreNLPProvider with the provided text read in
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the text file cannot be found
